sec.div: TN flux estimation at aggregated scales
sec.p:
In order to understand TN fluxes for large regions, TN flux estimates for HUC8 watersheds within those regions were combined in a manner analogous to earlier studies
19, 41 . Briefly, TN fluxes for large aggregated regions were estimated by aggregating the nitrogen loads [kg N y −1] for all HUC8 watersheds falling within the region. The TN load from a watershed was obtained by multiplying the loading per unit area ( Q TN [kg N km − 2 y −1]) by the watershed area ([km 2]).
